title: S rank is too hard to get. . . .
body:
I went 6/0/23 with 163 cs in a 40 minute game (or about that much).  I got an A-.  I had one teammate pretty much hogging the kills and this shouldn't affect my rank score.  I should of gotten an S for that if not even an S or S-, an A+.

edit:  I'm not even saying I'm a good player but when a player does well that player should be rewarded for it.

replies.body: 163 cs in a 40 minute game is pretty bad buddy.

Can't do much when we already pushed into their base. . .they we're just defending for the second half (or maybe 2/3) of the game.  I can't cs in their base. . .or I rather not do it since late game anything can happen.

Unlikely that you were in there base for 22 minutes without ending.

Lets just say people started doing stupid things like in those low MMR games which I am in btw.  You know typical stupid plays just tower diving and jumping into a enemy team just to kill the support.

I thought it was like, every few weeks or so, I'm not sure. 

Either way, I've had quite a few great games with champs I haven't gotten a chest yet that I thought might be worthy of an S and, nope, just an A.

Of course, it's nothing to throw a big tizzy fit over, but I was definitely like "Hey wait a minute,  this new judging system might be a bit strict"

It also judges different roles differently.  For example Jungler is usually about the toughest role for the system to judge you worthy of that S.  Whereas with Support, you can have lots of games where you feel you didn't do all that great but then at the post game screen it's like "YOU EARNED AN S  Here's a chest"  and it's like "Um ok, I didn't think I did all that great, but I'll take that chest.  Thank you Rito"

Probably not at the top of the priorities, but it would be nice for this system to get some tweaks later on, or adjust it so that you can also get a chest or two if you consistently get A's with a champ.  Like provided you didn't get a chest with a champ yet and haven't gotten that S, but have gotten about 3 A's then on that third A, you get the chest.

Just an idea or two.

you can only get one chest per champ per season

you can earn a chest once per week ( more if you have 4 stored cuz you havent earned in a while )

Unless you are playing support, that score just isn't top 95% material. And thats what a S rank represents.
S+ is even higher than that.

It should be rare/hard to achieve by definition.
try to bring ur CS to atleast 200 by 30 mins  163 is too low for a 40 minute match, remember to ward and clear wards (buy control wards)

163 CS in a 40 min game is kind of low.


That being said, I do agree that getting S ranked is too hard now.

Or at least it's gotten a LOT harder.

I used to get S rank and a hextech box fairly often.  Even a couple of times when I think I didn't do all that great.

Now even when I have really great games the most I get is an A.

Now with the honor system I have 2 keys but no boxes :(

I think Rito is just trying to cheap out on giving boxes.

Kills is not the only thing that determines Rank


CS/Overall Gold by a certain time: In this case, it should have been higher
Wards. 
Control Wards
Destroying Wards
Kill Participation (Kills or assists, so long as your picture pops up in some form when an enemy dies)

and some other stuff. Overall all, the above is some major ones to keep in mind.

at that amount of time it is normal to have 300+ cs if you are having trouble just farm raptors and krugs on both sides of the jg
